name: Wheel of Fortune
overview: Wheel of Fortune as now bigger and better than ever in this all new Super Nintendo edition of television's most popular game-show. Featuring over 4,500 all new puzzles, digitized photography of the actual set and even digitized speech from the beautiful Vanna White. Choose the contestant you want to be, play against the computer or up to two friends spin the Wheel, buy a vowel or attempt to solve the puzzle before you go bankrupt.
